lead_paragraph: Gov. Doug Ducey of Arizona signed a law Wednesday that makes it a felony for anyone but a family member, roommate, caregiver, postal worker or elections official to collect early ballots.

headline.print_headline: Arizona: New Law Limits Who Can Collect Early Ballots
headline.main: Arizona: New Law Limits Who Can Collect Early Ballots

snippet: Gov. Doug Ducey of Arizona signed a law Wednesday that makes it a felony for anyone but a family member, roommate, caregiver, postal worker or elections official to collect early ballots.
abstract: Advocates for voter outreach say new law signed by Arizona Gov Doug Ducey restricting who can collect early ballots aims to suppress turnout in impoverished and minority communities.
